UpdateConsumerProfileCommand allows Consumers to update their account details and change the default Covid-19 preferences.

updatePassword(String) - Method in class model.User
Update the stored password hash to a new one, corresponding to the specified password.

User - Class in model
User is an abstraction, containing common state and behaviours shared by different kinds of users: Consumers and Staffs.
User(String, String) - Constructor for class model.User
Create a new User and save the user email and payment account email, but do not save the password in plaintext! This would be a security disaster, because a hacker could easily get it out of the application.
userEventsOnly - Variable in class command.ListEventsCommand
